description: it only has one sound, it would be nice if there were presets, or if you could select your own sounds. that being said, the default sound is pretty nice

It does what it's supposed to and is visually appealing. I would love to see an option for a visual feedback, Such as a dark window flashing white while muting the sound. Being able to save playlists would also be super useful.

It works well on my pinephone ^^ excellent work

it's a nice little app but I miss custom pace indicators like 7/8

If you want a visually-appealing everyday metronome, that's it. Would become a great app with a few additions:

- Dark theme
- Visual feedback (like a moving bar or flashing dots)
- Custom tempo (7/8, 12/8, etc.)

But I believe that, for most use-cases, it's already there.
summary: Very good metronome, a few features missing
